1370: Gherolf was born in Breestraat in 1370.
Got married to Ghodelde at age 23 in 1370.
Had a son with Ghodelde, Gherolf, at age 23.
1371: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Lenildis, at age 24.
1375: Had a son with Ghodelde, Wilbord, at age 28.
1379: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Clementia, at age 32.
1382: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Reymodis, at age 35.
1383: Lost son Wilbord when Wilbord was 9 years old.
1384: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Ryccie, at age 37.
1385: Had a son with Ghodelde, Alebrando, at age 38.
1388: Had a son with Ghodelde, Lubertus, at age 41.
1390: Lost son Lubertus when Lubertus was 3 years old.
1391: Lost son Gherolf when Gherolf was 22 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
